         <header class="lineup-header single-tag-row">
          <div class="styled__StyledSimpleTitleLineup-sc-1e57m8a-0 ixkxeN e-simple-title-lineup">
           <h2 class="e-title u-font-b is-arrowed">
            <a aria-label="Techno" class="e-internal-link title-link" href="/techno" tabindex="0" target="_self" title="Techno">
             <span aria-hidden="true" class="wrapper-inline">
              <span class="title-content">
               Techno
              </span>
              ﻿
              <svg aria-hidden="true" class="svg-icon svg-arrow_e" height="16" icon="svg-arrow_e" width="16">
               <use xlink:href="/app/shellunit/svg/rc_icons.svg#svg-arrow_e">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </span>
            </a>
           </h2>
          </div>
         </header>

            <a aria-hidden="true" class="e-external-link card-link hide-text text-svg-icon" href="http://ici.radio-canada.ca/mordu/techniques/1254/coupe-tartare-thon" tabindex="-1" target="_blank" title="Faire une coupe pour un tartare de thon (Photo: Radio-Canada / Capsule vidéo - Faire une coupe tartare de thon)  (Nouvelle fenêtre)">

             <!-- -->

             </span>

               </span>
              </div>
              <div class="m-simple-play">
               <div class="simple-play-url">
                <a aria-hidden="true" class="styled__StyledButtonLink-sc-1u0weh7-1 ezTtBI e-button e-card-play-button" href="http://ici.radio-canada.ca/mordu/techniques/1254/coupe-tartare-thon?isAutoPlay=1" tabindex="-1" title="Faire une coupe pour un tartare de thon (Regarder la vidéo)">

                   </use>
                  </svg>

                    Antoine Bertrand, le « gentleman-farmer »
                   </span>
                  </span>
                 </a>
                </h3>
               </header>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </article>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </section>

  <script>
   function formatDate(t){var e=t.timeUtc,n=t.format,a=t.hasTimeZone,c=void 0===a||a,o=t.isA11y,r=t.prefix,u=new Date,i=u-e,s=Math.floor(i/1e3/60),g=Math.floor(s/60),m=o?"":" ",l=1<e.getHours()?"s":"",h=o?" heure".concat(l):" h",d=o?" heure".concat(l," "):" h ",f=1<e.getMinutes()?"s":"",T=o?" minute".concat(f):"",D=c?e.getDate():e.getUTCDate(),p=getDayFr(e,c),v=p.replace(/^\w/,function(t){return t.toUpperCase()}),M=c?e.getFullYear():e.getUTCFullYear(),S=c?e.getHours():e.getUTCHours(),y=c?e.getMinutes():e.getUTCMinutes(),F=c?e.getMonth():e.getUTCMonth(),w=getMonthFr(e,c),C=c?e.getSeconds():e.getUTCSeconds(),U=getSmallDayFr(e,c),G=U.replace(/^\w/,function(t){return t.toUpperCase()}),b=getSmallMonthFr(e,c),j=getFormatted(D),Z=getFormatted(S),A=getFormatted(y),H=getFormatted(F),N=getFormatted(C);switch(n){case"date":return"".concat(D," ").concat(w," ").concat(M);case"date-time":return"".concat(M,"-").concat(H,"-").concat(j," ").concat(Z,":").concat(A,":").concat(N);case"date-with-hours":return"".concat(D).concat(m).concat(w).concat(m).concat(M," à ").concat(S).concat(d).concat(A).concat(T);case"date-with-weekday":return"".concat(p," ").concat(D," ").concat(w," ").concat(M);case"diffusion-date-time":return"".concat(v," ").concat(D," ").concat(w,", ").concat(S).concat(d).concat(A).concat(T);case"full-date":return"".concat(p," ").concat(D," ").concat(w);case"full-date-and-year":return"".concat(p," ").concat(D," ").concat(w," ").concat(M);case"full-date-hours":return"".concat(p).concat(m).concat(D).concat(m).concat(w).concat(m).concat(M," à ").concat(S).concat(d).concat(A).concat(T);case"full-day":return"".concat(p);case"hour":return"".concat(S).concat(h);case"hours":return g<=1?"".concat("string"==typeof r?r:"","1 heure"):"".concat("string"==typeof r?r:"").concat(g," heures");case"minutes":return s<=1?"".concat("string"==typeof r?r:"","1 minute"):"".concat("string"==typeof r?r:"").concat(s," minutes");case"simple-day":return"".concat(U);case"simple-date":return"".concat(D," ").concat(b);case"simple-date-full-month":return"".concat(D," ").concat(w);case"simple-date-full-month-year":return"".concat(D," ").concat(w," ").concat(M);case"simple-date-with-hour":return"".concat(D," ").concat(w," ").concat(M," ").concat(S).concat(d).concat(A).concat(T);case"small-full-date":return"".concat(G," ").concat(D," ").concat(b);case"simple-hour":return getSimpleHour(S,d,A,T);case"simple-hour-with-timezone":var z=getTimeZoneShortFr(e);z=z?z.toUpperCase():null;var Y=getSimpleHour(S,d,A,T);return z?"".concat(Y,"&nbsp;").concat(z):Y;case"simple-hour-zero":return" ".concat(Z).concat(d).concat(A).concat(T);case"timezone-long-date-time":return"".concat(getTimeZoneLongFr(e));case"timezone-short-date-time":return"".concat(getTimeZoneShortFr(e));case"yyyy-mm-dd":return"".concat(e.getFullYear(),"-").concat((e.getMonth()+1).toString().padStart(2,"0"),"-").concat(e.getDate().toString().padStart(2,"0"));case"day-name-short-dayNumber-hour-separated-by-dashes":return"".concat(U,". ").concat(D," - ").concat(getSimpleHour(S,d,A,T));default:return""}}function formatDuration(t,e){var n=Math.floor(t/3600),a=Math.floor((t-3600*n)/60),c=Math.floor(t-3600*n-60*a),o=0<n?"".concat(n,":"):"",r=a<10?"0".concat(a,":"):"".concat(a,":"),u=c<10?"0".concat(c):c,i=[];0<n&&i.push("".concat(n," heure").concat(1<n?"s":"")),0<a&&i.push("".concat(a," minute").concat(1<a?"s":"")),0<c&&i.push("".concat(c," seconde").concat(1<c?"s":""));var s=o.concat(r,u),g=i.join(" ");return e?g:s}function getDayFr(t){return["dimanche","lundi","mardi","mercredi","jeudi","vendredi","samedi"][!(1<arguments.length&&void 0!==arguments[1])||arguments[1]?t.getDay():t.getUTCDay()]}function getFormatted(t){return t<10?"0".concat(t):t}function getMonthFr(t){return["janvier","février","mars","avril","mai","juin","juillet","août","septembre","octobre","novembre","décembre"][!(1<arguments.length&&void 0!==arguments[1])||arguments[1]?t.getMonth():t.getUTCMonth()]}function getSmallDayFr(t){return["dim","lun","mar","mer","jeu","ven","sam"][!(1<arguments.length&&void 0!==arguments[1])||arguments[1]?t.getDay():t.getUTCDay()]}function getSmallMonthFr(t){return["janv","févr","mars","avr","mai","juin","juil","août","sept","oct","nov","déc"][!(1<arguments.length&&void 0!==arguments[1])||arguments[1]?t.getMonth():t.getUTCMonth()]}function getTimeFromNewDate(){return(new Date).getTime()}function getTimeZoneLongFr(t){var e=getTimeZone(t);return null!=e?e.long:""}function getTimeZoneShortFr(t){var e=getTimeZone(t);return null!=e?e.short:""}function getTimeZone(t){var e=t.toString().match(/(GMT-\d{4})/g),n=null!=e&&0<e.length?e[0]:"",a=isDST(t);return[{gmt:"GMT-0230",isDST:!0,long:"heure avancée de Terre-Neuve",short:"hatn"},{gmt:"GMT-0330",isDST:!1,long:"heure normale de Terre-Neuve",short:"hntn"},{gmt:"GMT-0300",isDST:!0,long:"heure avancée de l'Atlantique",short:"haa"},{gmt:"GMT-0400",isDST:!1,long:"heure normale de l'Atlantique",short:"hna"},{gmt:"GMT-0400",isDST:!0,long:"heure avancée de l'Est",short:"hae"},{gmt:"GMT-0500",isDST:!1,long:"heure normale de L'Est",short:"hne"},{gmt:"GMT-0500",isDST:!0,long:"heure avancée du Centre",short:"hac"},{gmt:"GMT-0600",isDST:!1,long:"heure normale du Centre",short:"hnc"},{gmt:"GMT-0600",isDST:!0,long:"heure avancée des Rocheuses",short:"har"},{gmt:"GMT-0700",isDST:!1,long:"heure normale des Rocheuses",short:"hnr"},{gmt:"GMT-0700",isDST:!0,long:"heure avancée du Pacifique",short:"hap"},{gmt:"GMT-0800",isDST:!1,long:"heure normale du Pacifique",short:"hnp"}].find(function(t){return t.isDST===a&&t.gmt===n})}function isDST(t){var e=new Date(t.getFullYear(),0,1).getTimezoneOffset(),n=new Date(t.getFullYear(),6,1).getTimezoneOffset();return Math.max(e,n)!==t.getTimezoneOffset()}function isToday(t){var e=new Date,n=new Date(t);return n.getDate()===e.getDate()&&n.getMonth()===e.getMonth()&&n.getFullYear()===e.getFullYear()}function getSimpleHour(t,e,n,a){return"".concat(t).concat(e).concat(n).concat(a)}function formatTime(){if("undefined"!=typeof document){for(var t=[],e=document.getElementsByTagName("time"),n=0;n<e.length;n+=1)e[n].getAttribute("data-timeutc")&&t.push(e[n]);for(var a=0;a<t.length;a+=1){var c=t[a].getAttribute("data-prefix"),o=new Date(t[a].getAttribute("data-timeutc")),r=t[a].getAttribute("data-format");t[a].innerHTML=formatDate({timeUtc:o,format:r,prefix:c})}}}function transformDateSlugToDateOffset(t){var e=(new Date).getTime(),n=new Date(t).getTime()-e;return Math.round(n/864e5)+1}0<document.getElementsByTagName("esi:include").length&&console.error("WARNING <ESI> markup should not be there"),formatTime();
